RegisterDescription.ToolTip: Allied Vision USB3 Vision camera interface

Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Category.Name: ColorTransformationControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Color Transformation control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Color Transformation control features.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes the control the user sets feature that is used to save and load sets of parameters in the camera.
Category.Description: This category includes the control the user sets feature that is used to save and load sets of parameters in the camera.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.

Category.Name: FileAccessControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the File Access control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the File Access control features.

Category.Name: CorrectionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the correction control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the correction control features.

Category.Name: CorrectionInfo
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains correction information features.
Category.Description: Category that contains correction information features.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor of the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Areascan
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 2D sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: 2D sensor.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFamilyName
StringReg.ToolTip: Identifier of the product family of the device.
StringReg.Description: Identifier of the product family of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the DeviceFirmwareVersion to read.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the DeviceFirmwareVersion to read.

EnumEntry.Name: Current
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device firmware version of the running firmware.
EnumEntry.Description: Device firmware version of the running firmware.

EnumEntry.Name: Programmed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device firmware version stored in nonvolatile memory.
EnumEntry.Description: Device firmware version stored in nonvolatile memory.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceFirmwareIDSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the DeviceFirmwareID to read.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the DeviceFirmwareID to read.

EnumEntry.Name: Current
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device firmware ID of the running firmware.
EnumEntry.Description: Device firmware ID of the running firmware.

EnumEntry.Name: Supported
EnumEntry.ToolTip: List of supported firmware ID's.
EnumEntry.Description: List of supported firmware ID's.

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.Description: Device`s serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionSubMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Sub minor version of Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceGenCPVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the GenCP protocol supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Major version of the GenCP protocol supported by the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceGenCPVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the GenCP protocol supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the GenCP protocol supported by the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimitMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active. When disabled, lower level TL specific features are expected to control the throughput. When enabled, DeviceLinkThroughputLimit controls the overall throughput.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit feature.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link.
Integer.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state. After reset, the device must be rediscovered.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceIndicatorMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the behavior of the indicators (such as LEDs) showing the status of the Device.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the behavior of the indicators (such as LEDs) showing the status of the Device.

EnumEntry.Name: Inactive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device`s indicators are inactive (Off).
EnumEntry.Description: Device`s indicators are inactive (Off).

EnumEntry.Name: Active
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device`s indicators are active showing their respective status.
EnumEntry.Description: Device`s indicators are active showing their respective status.

EnumEntry.Name: ErrorStatus
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device`s indicators are inactive unless an error occurs.
EnumEntry.Description: Device`s indicators are inactive unless an error occurs.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.

EnumEntry.Name: Mainboard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the device's mainboard.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the device's mainboard.

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.Description: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.

Integer.Name: Timestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current value of the device timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Reports the current value of the device timestamp counter.

Integer.Name: DeviceFirmwareUploadType
Integer.ToolTip: Type of the firmware upload implementation of this device.
Integer.Description: Type of the firmware upload implementation of this device.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: BinningSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control the sensor binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control the sensor binning.

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Sum
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image.

Enumeration.Name: BinningVerticalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode used to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Sum
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image.

Enumeration.Name: DecimationHorizontalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to reduce the horizontal resolution when DecimationHorizontal is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode used to reduce the horizontal resolution when DecimationHorizontal is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Discard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The value of every Nth pixel is kept, others are discarded.
EnumEntry.Description: The value of every Nth pixel is kept, others are discarded.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The value of a group of N adjacents pixels are averaged.
EnumEntry.Description: The value of a group of N adjacents pixels are averaged.

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image by the specified horizontal decimation factor.

Enumeration.Name: DecimationVerticalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to reduce the Vertical resolution when DecimationVertical is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode used to reduce the Vertical resolution when DecimationVertical is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Discard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The value of every Nth pixel is kept, others are discarded.
EnumEntry.Description: The value of every Nth pixel is kept, others are discarded.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The value of a group of N adjacents pixels are averaged.
EnumEntry.Description: The value of a group of N adjacents pixels are averaged.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter combined in a single feature.

EnumEntry.Description: Monochrome 8-bit

EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Green-Red 12-bit unpacked

EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Green-Blue 16-bit

EnumEntry.Description: YCbCr 4:2:2 8-bit

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.
Enumeration.Description: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 1 bit per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: 1 bit per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 2 bits per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: 2 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 4 bits per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: 4 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 bits per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 10 bits per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: 10 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 12 bits per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: 12 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp14
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 14 bits per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: 14 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp16
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 16 bits per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: 16 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp20
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 20 bits per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: 20 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp24
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 24 bits per pixel.
EnumEntry.Description: 24 bits per pixel.

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.
Enumeration.Description: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.

EnumEntry.Name: None
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No color filter.
EnumEntry.Description: No color filter.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Red Green filter.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Red Green filter.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Green Blue filter.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Green Blue filter.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Green Red filter.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Green Red filter.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Blue Green filter.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Blue Green filter.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One frame is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: One frame is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionAbort
Command.Description: Aborts the Acquisition immediately. This will end the capture without completing the current Frame or waiting on a trigger. If no Acquisition is in progress, the command is ignored.

Command.Name: AcquisitionArm
Command.ToolTip: Arms the device before an AcquisitionStart command.
Command.Description: Arms the device before an AcquisitionStart command. This optional command validates all the current features for consistency and prepares the device for a fast start of the Acquisition.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Defines the interconnection between the AcquisitionFrameRate affecting features.
Enumeration.Description: Defines the interconnection between the AcquisitionFrameRate affecting features.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: AcquisitionFrameRate not used
EnumEntry.Description: AcquisitionFrameRate not used

EnumEntry.Name: Basic
EnumEntry.ToolTip: ExposureTime influences the AcquisitionFrameRate
EnumEntry.Description: ExposureTime influences the AcquisitionFrameRate

EnumEntry.Name: ForceFrameRate
EnumEntry.ToolTip: AcquisitionFrameRate is deciding
EnumEntry.Description: AcquisitionFrameRate is deciding

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStatusSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTransfer
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently transferring an acquisition of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently transferring an acquisition of one or many frames.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a frame start trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a frame start trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing the capture of a frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing the capture of a frame.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a frame.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector.
Boolean.Description: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition. AcquisitionBurstFrameCount controls the length of each burst unless a FrameBurstEnd trigger is active. The total number of frames captured is also conditioned by AcquisitionFrameCount if AcquisitionMode is MultiFrame.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the selected trigger.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelHigh
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is high.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is high.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelLow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is low.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is low.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds [µs] to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds [µs] to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the Exposure and let the shutter open.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the Exposure and let the shutter open.

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timed exposure.
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart (see Figure 53 and Figure 54).

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration. Note that if the Frame or Line TriggerActivation is RisingEdge or LevelHigh, the exposure duration will be the time the trigger stays High. If TriggerActivation is FallingEdge or LevelLow, the exposure time will last as long as the trigger stays Low.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerControlled
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses one or more trigger signal(s) to control the exposure duration independently from the current Frame or Line triggers.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses one or more trigger signal(s) to control the exposure duration independently from the current Frame or Line triggers. See ExposureStart, ExposureEnd and ExposureActive of the TriggerSelector feature.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time [µs] when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time [µs] when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain [dB] as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain [dB] as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps.

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Balance ratio to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Balance ratio to control.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the green channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the green channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.

Float.Name: BalanceRatio
Float.ToolTip: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component.
Float.Description: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component. It is used for white balancing.

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity. This is typically used to compensate for non-linearity of the display system (such as CRT).

Float.Name: Hue
Float.ToolTip: Controls the hue correction of color tone.
Float.Description: Controls the hue correction of color tone. It rotates the chrominance field clockwise with values > 0 and counter clockwise with values < 0.

Float.Name: Saturation
Float.ToolTip: Controls the amplification of only the chrominance signal in the color space.
Float.Description: Controls the amplification of only the chrominance signal in the color space.

Enumeration.Name: ColorTransformationSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Color Transformation module is controlled by the various Color Transformation features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Color Transformation module is controlled by the various Color Transformation features.

EnumEntry.Name: RGBtoRGB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: RGB to RGB color transformation.
EnumEntry.Description: RGB to RGB color transformation.

Boolean.Name: ColorTransformationEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the selected Color Transformation module.
Boolean.Description: Activates the selected Color Transformation module.

Enumeration.Name: ColorTransformationValueSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Gain factor or Offset of the Transformation matrix to access in the selected Color Transformation module.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Gain factor or Offset of the Transformation matrix to access in the selected Color Transformation module.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain00
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 0,0 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 0,0 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain01
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 0,1 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 0,1 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain02
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 0,2 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 0,2 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 1,0 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 1,0 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain11
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 1,1 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 1,1 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 1,2 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 1,2 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain20
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 2,0 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 2,0 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain21
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 2,1 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 2,1 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain22
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain 2,2 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain 2,2 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Offset0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Offset 0 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Offset 0 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Offset1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Offset 1 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Offset 1 of the transformation matrix.

EnumEntry.Name: Offset2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Offset 2 of the transformation matrix.
EnumEntry.Description: Offset 2 of the transformation matrix.

Float.Name: ColorTransformationValue
Float.ToolTip: Represents the value of the selected Gain factor or Offset inside the Transformation matrix.
Float.Description: Represents the value of the selected Gain factor or Offset inside the Transformation matrix.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector or the virtual line of the Transport Layer to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector or the virtual line of the Transport Layer to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Input
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected physical line is used to Input an electrical signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected physical line is used to Input an electrical signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Output
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected physical line is used to Output an electrical signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected physical line is used to Output an electrical signal.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line. LineMode must be Output.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line output is disabled (Tri-State).
EnumEntry.Description: Line output is disabled (Tri-State).

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many Frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many Frames.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a Frame start trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a Frame start trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing the capture of a Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing the capture of a Frame.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: Stream0TransferActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Transfer on the stream is active.
EnumEntry.Description: Transfer on the stream is active.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadoutActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing a Readout from the Image Sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing a Readout from the Image Sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many Frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many Frames.

EnumEntry.Name: BurstTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a Burst Trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a Burst Trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerSetChange
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates when a Sequencer Path Trigger occured, which changed the sequencer set.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates when a Sequencer Path Trigger occured, which changed the sequencer set.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerPathTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates when a Sequencer Path Trigger occured.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates when a Sequencer Path Trigger occured.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a Sequencer Path Trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a Sequencer Path Trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the bit 0 of the User Output register.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the bit 0 of the User Output register.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the bit 1 of the User Output register.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the bit 1 of the User Output register.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the bit 2 of the User Output register.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the bit 2 of the User Output register.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the bit 3 of the User Output register.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the bit 3 of the User Output register.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.

Enumeration.Name: InputDebounceMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Switches the InputDebounceTime feature for a particular input line on or off.
Enumeration.Description: Switches the InputDebounceTime feature for a particular input line on or off. If a line is configured as output (dedicated or selectable), this feature has no effect.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables input debouncing for the selected line.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables input debouncing for the selected line.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables input debouncing for the selected line.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables input debouncing for the selected line.

Float.Name: InputDebounceTime
Float.ToolTip: Debounces the signal of an input line. Stable time in µs.
Float.Description: Debounces the signal of an input line - the signal must be stable for the specified amount of time [µs] before it is provided to the camera internal logic. If a line is configured as output (dedicated or selectable), this feature has no effect.

Enumeration.Name: OutputDurationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Switches the OutputDurationTime feature for a particular output line on or off.
Enumeration.Description: Switches the OutputDurationTime feature for a particular output line on or off. If a line is configured as input (dedicated or selectable), this feature has no effect.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables output duration for the selected line.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables output duration for the selected line.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables output duration for the selected line.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables output duration for the selected line.

Float.Name: OutputDurationTime
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the minimum time [µs] a signal is provided at the output line.
Float.Description: Specifies the minimum time [µs] a signal is provided at the output line. This feature may be used for internal signals that are active for a very short time frame (e.g. a single clock cycle). If a line is configured as input (dedicated or selectable), this feature has no effect.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting user set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 1.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 2.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 3.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 3.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 4.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 4.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting user set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 1.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 2.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 3.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 3.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 4.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 4.

Integer.Name: TestPendingAck
Integer.ToolTip: Tests the device's pending acknowledge feature.
Integer.Description: Tests the device's pending acknowledge feature. When this feature is written, the device waits a time period corresponding to the value of TestPendingAck before acknowledging the write.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Enumeration.Name: FileSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target file in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target file in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Firmware
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Firmware update file.
EnumEntry.Description: Firmware update file.

EnumEntry.Name: UserData
EnumEntry.ToolTip: File containing the user data.
EnumEntry.Description: File containing the user data.

EnumEntry.Name: DefectPixelCorrection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: File containing the Factory Defect Pixel Correction.
EnumEntry.Description: File containing the Factory Defect Pixel Correction.

EnumEntry.Name: FixedPatternNoiseCorrection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: File for the Factory Fixed Pattern Noise Correction.
EnumEntry.Description: File for the Factory Fixed Pattern Noise Correction.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device. This Operation is executed when the FileOperationExecute feature is called.

EnumEntry.Name: Open
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Opens the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Opens the file selected by FileSelector in the device. The access mode in which the file is opened is selected by FileOpenMode

EnumEntry.Name: Close
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Closes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Closes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Read
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Reads FileAccessLength bytes from the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset into FileAccessBuffer.
EnumEntry.Description: Reads FileAccessLength bytes from the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset into FileAccessBuffer.

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Writes FileAccessLength bytes taken from the FileAccessBuffer into the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset.
EnumEntry.Description: Writes FileAccessLength bytes taken from the FileAccessBuffer into the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset.

EnumEntry.Name: Delete
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Deletes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Deletes the file selected by FileSelector in the device. Note that deleting a device file should not remove the associated FileSelector entry to allow future operation on this file.

Command.Name: FileOperationExecute
Command.ToolTip: Executes the operation selected by FileOperationSelector on the selected file.
Command.Description: Executes the operation selected by FileOperationSelector on the selected file.

Enumeration.Name: FileOpenMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Read
EnumEntry.ToolTip: This mode selects read-only open mode.
EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects read-only open mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.ToolTip: This mode selects write-only open mode.
EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects write-only open mode.

Register.Name: FileAccessBuffer
Register.ToolTip: Defines the intermediate access buffer that allows the exchange of data between the device file storage and the application.
Register.Description: Defines the intermediate access buffer that allows the exchange of data between the device file storage and the application.

Integer.Name: FileAccessOffset
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Offset of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.
Integer.Description: Controls the Offset of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.

Integer.Name: FileAccessLength
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Length of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.
Integer.Description: Controls the Length of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Represents the file operation execution status.
Enumeration.Description: Represents the file operation execution status.

EnumEntry.Name: Success
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The recent file operation was successful.
EnumEntry.Description: The recent file operation was successful.

EnumEntry.Name: Failure
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The recent file operation failed.
EnumEntry.Description: The recent file operation failed.

EnumEntry.Name: Invalid
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The recent firmware file is invalid.
EnumEntry.Description: The recent firmware file is invalid.

EnumEntry.Name: Denied
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The recent firmware file is not suitable for this device.
EnumEntry.Description: The recent firmware file is not suitable for this device.

EnumEntry.Name: Error
EnumEntry.ToolTip: An error ocurred with the recent firmware file.
EnumEntry.Description: An error ocurred with the recent firmware file.

EnumEntry.Name: Fault1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: An error ocurred with the recent firmware file.
EnumEntry.Description: An error ocurred with the recent firmware file.

EnumEntry.Name: Fault2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: An error ocurred with the recent firmware file.
EnumEntry.Description: An error ocurred with the recent firmware file.

Integer.Name: FileOperationResult
Integer.ToolTip: Represents the file operation result.
Integer.Description: Represents the file operation result. For Read or Write operations, the number of successfully read/written bytes is returned.

Integer.Name: FileSize
Integer.ToolTip: Represents the size of the selected file in bytes.
Integer.Description: Represents the size of the selected file in bytes.

Enumeration.Name: FileProcessStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Represents an additional process status.
Enumeration.Description: Represents an additional process status.

Enumeration.Name: FileStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Represents the status of the selected file.
Enumeration.Description: Represents the status of the selected file. Allied Vision feature.

EnumEntry.Name: Closed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: File is closed.
EnumEntry.Description: File is closed.

EnumEntry.Name: Open
EnumEntry.ToolTip: File is open.
EnumEntry.Description: File is open.

Enumeration.Name: CorrectionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of Correction to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of Correction to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: DefectPixelCorrection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: access/control Defect Pixel Correction
EnumEntry.Description: access/control Defect Pixel Correction

EnumEntry.Name: FixedPatternNoiseCorrection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: access/control Fixed Pattern Noise Correction
EnumEntry.Description: access/control Fixed Pattern Noise Correction

Enumeration.Name: CorrectionSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Defines which correction settings are used.
Enumeration.Description: Defines which correction settings are used.

EnumEntry.Name: Factory
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The factory set for the selected type of Correction is used.
EnumEntry.Description: The factory set for the selected type of Correction is used.

EnumEntry.Name: User
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The user-defined set for the selected type of Correction is used.
EnumEntry.Description: The user-defined set for the selected type of Correction is used.

Enumeration.Name: CorrectionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected type of Correction is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected type of Correction is active.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the selected type of Correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the selected type of Correction.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the selected type of Correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the selected type of Correction.

Enumeration.Name: CorrectionSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Defines the default Correction Set used when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Defines the default Correction Set used when the device is reset.

EnumEntry.Name: Factory
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The factory set for the selected type of Correction is used.
EnumEntry.Description: The factory set for the selected type of Correction is used.

EnumEntry.Name: User
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The user-defined set for the selected type of Correction is used.
EnumEntry.Description: The user-defined set for the selected type of Correction is used.

Integer.Name: CorrectionDataSize
Integer.ToolTip: Defines the current size of the correction data that is stored inside the camera.
Integer.Description: Defines the current size of the correction data that is stored inside the camera.

Integer.Name: CorrectionEntryType
Integer.ToolTip: Defines the Entry Type (Correction Type specific variant).
Integer.Description: Defines the Entry Type (Correction Type specific variant).

IntSwissKnife.Name: PixelFormatImpl
IntSwissKnife.Formula: REGPIXELFORMATIMPL && (REGPIXELFORMATMONO8IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO10IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO10PIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO12IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO12PIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO14IMPL|| REGPIXELFORMATMONO16IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR8IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG8IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB8IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG8IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR10IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG10IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB10IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG10IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR10PIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG10PIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB10PIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG10PIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR16IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG16IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB16IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG16IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR12IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG12IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB12IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG12IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR12PIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG12PIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB12PIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG12PIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATRGB8IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATBGR8IMPL || REGPIXELFORMATYCBCR8_CBYCRIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATYCBCR411_8_CBYYCRYYIMPL || REGPIXELFORMATYCBCR422_8_CBYCRYIMPL)

IntSwissKnife.Name: PixelFormatAvail
IntSwissKnife.Formula: REGPIXELFORMATAVAIL && (REGPIXELFORMATMONO8AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO10AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO10PAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO12AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO12PAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO14AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATMONO16AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR8AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG8AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB8AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG8AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR10AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG10AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB10AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG10AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR10PAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG10PAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB10PAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG10PAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR16AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG16AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB16AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG16AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR12AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG12AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB12AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG12AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGR12PAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERRG12PAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERGB12PAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBAYERBG12PAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATRGB8AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATBGR8AVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATYCBCR8_CBYCRAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATYCBCR411_8_CBYYCRYYAVAIL || REGPIXELFORMATYCBCR422_8_CBYCRYAVAIL)

Converter.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateValue
Converter.FormulaTo: REGACQUISITIONFRAMERATETIMEMIN + REGACQUISITIONFRAMERATETIMEINC *TRUNC(((1000000000 / (((FROM = 0) ? 0.000000001 : FROM)) - REGACQUISITIONFRAMERATETIMEMIN + REGACQUISITIONFRAMERATETIMEINC/2)/ REGACQUISITIONFRAMERATETIMEINC))

IntSwissKnife.Name: LineSourceImpl
IntSwissKnife.Formula: REGLINESOURCEIMPL && (REGLINESOURCEOFFIMPL || REGLINESOURCEACQUISITIONACTIVEIMPL || REGLINESOURCEFRAMETRIGGERWAITIMPL || REGLINESOURCEFRAMEACTIVEIMPL || REGLINESOURCEEXPOSUREACTIVEIMPL || REGLINESOURCESTREAM0TRANSFERACTIVEIMPL || REGLINESOURCEREADOUTACTIVEIMPL || REGLINESOURCEACQUISITIONTRIGGERWAITIMPL || REGLINESOURCEBURSTTRIGGERWAITIMPL || REGLINESOURCESEQUENCERSETCHANGEIMPL || REGLINESOURCESEQUENCERPATHTRIGGERIMPL || REGLINESOURCESEQUENCERTRIGGERWAITIMPL || REGLINESOURCEUSEROUTPUT0IMPL || REGLINESOURCEUSEROUTPUT1IMPL || REGLINESOURCEUSEROUTPUT2IMPL || REGLINESOURCEUSEROUTPUT3IMPL)

IntSwissKnife.Name: LineSourceAvail
IntSwissKnife.Formula: REGLINESOURCEAVAIL && (REGLINESOURCEOFFAVAIL || REGLINESOURCEACQUISITIONACTIVEAVAIL || REGLINESOURCEFRAMETRIGGERWAITAVAIL || REGLINESOURCEFRAMEACTIVEAVAIL || REGLINESOURCEEXPOSUREACTIVEAVAIL || REGLINESOURCESTREAM0TRANSFERACTIVEAVAIL || REGLINESOURCEREADOUTACTIVEAVAIL || REGLINESOURCEACQUISITIONTRIGGERWAITAVAIL || REGLINESOURCEBURSTTRIGGERWAITAVAIL || REGLINESOURCESEQUENCERSETCHANGEAVAIL || REGLINESOURCESEQUENCERPATHTRIGGERAVAIL || REGLINESOURCESEQUENCERTRIGGERWAITAVAIL || REGLINESOURCEUSEROUTPUT0AVAIL || REGLINESOURCEUSEROUTPUT1AVAIL || REGLINESOURCEUSEROUTPUT2AVAIL || REGLINESOURCEUSEROUTPUT3AVAIL)

IntSwissKnife.Name: UserSetSaveLocked
IntSwissKnife.Formula: TLPARAMSLOCKED || (USERSETSELECTOR = 1 && REGUSERSETSELECTORDEFAULTLOCKED) || (USERSETSELECTOR = 2 && REGUSERSETSELECTORUSERSET1LOCKED) || (USERSETSELECTOR = 3 && REGUSERSETSELECTORUSERSET2LOCKED) || (USERSETSELECTOR = 4 && REGUSERSETSELECTORUSERSET3LOCKED) || (USERSETSELECTOR = 5 && REGUSERSETSELECTORUSERSET4LOCKED)
